string.text: Zdravo! Imam neke delove mutanata za tebe.

Zdravo, Obeleženi! Evo moje ponude. Donesi mi:
3 repa Slepog Psa
 ili 6 papaka Divljeg Vepra.
 Imam mušteriju koja od tih delova pravi lekove.
Zdravo Den, doneo sam papke. Izvoli.
Zdravo Den, doneo sam repove koje si tražio.
Jesi doneo papke?! Odlièno, dobiæu dobru cenu za njih!
Doneo si mi repove. Odlièno!
Nažalost, još ih nisam dovoljo sakupio
Zdravo Lisac, kako ide?

Ti prokleti psi su me gotovo rastrgali na komadiæe. Love ma kao da mi je ranac pun kobasica. Slušaj Obeleženi, možeš li mi doneti paket od predstraže Djutija, koja se nalazi na severnoj strni Deponije? Samo pitaj komandira, oèekuje me. To je jedan dobar pištolj koji æe mi pomoæi da se odbranim od ovih prokletih pasa. Ja æu ostati ovde sa Doktorom da me zakrpa. Ne brini, nagrada æe biti adekvatna.
Dobro, Lisac, pomoæi æu ti. I tako treba da izvidim to podruèje. Vratiæu se brzo.
Da ti donesem šta? Želiš od mene da rizikujem život, a da ti sediš ovde i opijaš se sa Doktorom? Misliš stvarno da sam toliki glupan? Idi ti sam po ono šta ti treba a ja æu razgovarati sa Doktorom.

Evo, doneo sam pištolj. Lepo oružje, sviða mi se. Prapor mi nije odmah htio dati. Morao sam puno riskirati i nabaviti pipke Krvopije. A sigurno dobro znaš kako su oni opasni i kako se bore. Treba mi votka!
Hvala puno, Obeleženi! Žao mi je zbog tih nevolja. Sada bar imam dobru vatrenu moæ protiv tih mutanata, i ima da krvavo plate svaki napad na mene! Izvoli nagradu.
Zdravo, Prapor, došao sam poslom. Lisac kaže da imaš neki paket za njega. On je povreðen, Pseudopsi su ga dobro izgrizli, pa sam ja došao po paket.
Šta ti misliš da je ovo neka samoposluga? Ako želiš paket, onda moraš i da ga zaslužiš! Donesi mi 2 krvopijina pipka i onda æeš dobiti paket. Recimo da je to naknada za èuvanje paketa.
Vidim da misliš ozbiljno. Dobro, doneæu ih. Mislim da Lisac neæe dugo živeti bez kakvog boljeg oružja a i obeæao sam da æu mu ga doneti.
Pa, Prapor, bolje i ne pitaj za moje zdravlje. Evo ti pipci. Teško sam došao do njih. Gde je taj prokleti paket?.

Hvala, Obeleženi! Vidim da ipak nisi poèetnik. Ti pipci su neophodni za moje zdravlje, jak lek se pravi od njih. Da budem iskren, napravili smo jedno klaðenje da li æeš se vratiti ili ne. Izgubio sam 5 flaša votke... HAHA!
Izgleda da mi treba tvoja pomoæ.
Svima kad-tad treba moja pomoæ. Èitava Zona koristi moje informacije.
General Voronjin me poslao. Rekao mi je da ti znaš ko je ubio Fanga i zašto je to uradio!?.

Obeleženi, ti si cenjena osoba u Zoni. Ali zašto ljudi misle da mogu doæi i besplatno tražiti informacije? Nema šanse momak, ako želiš informacije moraæeš da platiš! Neko je skoro ukrao PDA Tiranina, voðe Plaæenika. Blago reèeno, poludeo je skroz-naskroz. Leta okolo kao neki besni babun. Nadam se da razumeš koliko je to vredna informacija. Mnogi traže taj PDA, i Djuti i Fridom i Banditi. Svi ga se žele doèepati prije onih drugih. A ko zna ko ga ima i gde se sada nalazi. Ako pristaneš da ga doneseš do mene, uputiæu te do osobe koja æe ti reæi sve što zna. A veruj mi, zna mnogo.
OK, uradiæemo na tvoj naèin. Gde je ta "osoba" sa PDA?
U Moèvarama ima novi trgovac. Moji izvori mi kažu da je on nekako povezan s tim poslom i da najverovatnije on ima PDA.
Pronaæi æu ga. To je sve što trebam znati.
Još sam u jednom komadu a tu je i PDA. Slušaj, Plaæenici nekako previše znaju gde i kada æu negde biti. Upravo sam se izvukao i još jedne zasede. Pokušavaš mi namestiti?

To je odlièno! Stvarno si èovek od reèi! Plaæenici kažeš? Sve frakcije su u lovu na ovaj PDA. Istovremeno i Vojska, Fridom, Djuti pa èak i jajoglavi nauènici iz Jantara koriste usluge Plaæenika za svoje prljave poslove da ne bi ukaljali svoj imidž. A sada me slušaj pažljivo. Imam informaciju koju tražiš. U Vojnim Skladištima, u bazi Fridoma, u jednoj od baraka, pronaæi æeš Gavra. On je taj ko æe ti odgovoriti na pitanja o Fangu.
Ma zezaš me? U bazi Fridoma Plaæenik! Pa ovaj svet ili je stvarno poludeo ili sam nešto propustio?

Ne tako glasno, tiše èoveèe. Ne poznaješ uopšte tu užasnu osobu. On ima veze sa puno moænih ali zlih ljudi. Fridom je primio nove prototipove oružja preko njegovih nabavljaèa. Ta da su zažmirili na jedno oko i dupustili mu da posluje iz njihove baze. Gavra je jako opasna osoba, uvek budi na oprezu. Neka ti je sa sreæom. I da, uzmi ovaj artefakt, dobro æe ti doæi.
Den! Daæeš mi taj PDA a jedina cena koju æu ti platiti je ona u olovu! Znam da je kod tebe i zato se ne igraj samnom!
Smiri se Obeleženi! Evo uzmi ga, samo sam ga èuvao za nekoga. Ne znam uopšte šta je u njemu!
Taj seronja koji mi je dao PDA, me gotovo ubio. Kad ga vidim, ima da metak zagrize!
Veruj mi, Den, ne želim te ubiti, ali radi se o jako ozbiljnom poslu.
U redu je, Obeleženi, neka ti je sa sreæom...
Jesi li ti Gavra? Doušnik me poslao.
Ooo, stigao Obeleženi! Doušnik mi je rekao da tražiš Fangovog ubicu. Mogu ti pomoæi ali prvo moraš odraditi neki posao za nas. Biæeš dobro plaæen. A onda æu ti reæi šta želiš znati.
Izgleda da sklapam posao sa ðavolom. Kakav grešni posao imaš u planu?

Stalkeru, shvati jednom, ako želiš saznati tajnu o ubijenom, uradiæeš šta ti kažem. Doneo si Doušniku PDA, a iz njega smo saznali da je u našim redovim krtica. Ali nije tako jednostavno, to je jedan od naših voða. Nema više konkretnih dokaza, pa ga ne mogu ubiti. To dovelo do osvete i moguæeg rata u samom klanu. A ti, ti si nièija skitnica. Ubistvom te osoboe izbegle bi se sve moguæe posledice. Bolt je krtica, i u blizini je, na kraju ceste koja vodi u ovu bazu. Ako mi doneseš njegov lièni PDA, imaæu dokaz njegovog uèešæa u kraði Tiraninovog PDA. Slažeš se? Oèekuje te i dobra nagrada.
U redu, doneæu ti njegov PDA. Kakvog drugog izbora imam.
Koje si ti ðubre! Mogao si mi bar reæi u šta se upuštam! Snajperi i RPG-ovi! Evo ti PDA!
Vreða me slušanje tih tvojih vulgarnih reèi. Ja sam osoba ranjive duše i slabe graðe. I sam znaš da je Zona nepredvidivo mesto. U redu, evo ti kinta za votku.
Ne mogu verovati! Gordon Frimen lièno. Kako si ti dospeo ovamo? Èuo sam da si mrtav, ali to je oèigledno bila laž.

Sve èega se seæam je moj put u Zonu. U Kordonu sam iznajmio vodièa od èoveka po imenu Sidoroviè, masno sam ga platio. Proveo me kroz neku dolinu, pokraj jezera u neki fabrièki kompleks. Pogledao sam u vodièa i video da nešto nije u redu. Vikao sam na njega, ali nije reagovao. Oèi su mu bile ostakljene i prazne. Bojao sam da se pretvara u zombija. Èuo sam riku èudovišta i prepao za svoj život. Video sam tunel sa puno anomalija. Puno više se bojim èudovišta nego anomalija, pa sam uletio u tunel i pronašao mesto za spavanje. Glava me je jako boljela ali sam nekako zaspao. Ne znam koliko sam dugo bio tamo. Sedmicu, mesec? Ne mogu se setiti. Probudila me rika, još strašnija od prethodne. Video sam ogromno èudovište sa dve glave! Stajalo je u Elektro anomaliji i izgledalo je kao da se puni u njoj. Pokušao sam se tiho iskrasti, ali me je èulo i poèelo užasno režati. Bez šarafa, bez detektora, trèao sam i nisam se zaustavio dok nisam našao ovo utoèište. Ostavio sam svu svoju opremu u tom tunelu, Desert Eagle modifikovan na obiènu 9x39 municiju. Pištolj je jak, i sigurno možeš s njim ubiti par krvopija sa jednim sanžerom. Ali stvarno se bojim vratiti tamo. Hoæeš li mi potražiti taj pištolj? Donesi mi ga i daæu ti još jedan takav, plus jedan recept za artefakt.
Frimen, daj saberi se malo. Pronaæi æu ti pištolj.
Vratio sam se! Evo ti tvoj pištolj.
Obeleženi, drago mi je što te mogu zvati prijateljem. Izvoli Desert Eagle, kao što sam i obeæao.
Uživaš u Barmenovu društvu? Malo više votke nekada dobro doðe.

Da, dobro je društvo a i pije kao riba. Obeleženi, imam neki ozbiljni posao i treba mi pomoæ. Kada sam putovao sa svojim vodièem, i kada smo došli do Divlje Teritorije, sreli smo jednu osobu. Zvao se Džejms i tvrdio je da je iz Amerike. Popili smo dosta votke i uverio me da mu dam svoju aktovku sa dokumentima na èuvanje. A u njoj su jako važni dokumenti. Treba mi ta aktovka ali se bojim vratiti tamo. Ostao je u malom vagonu u Divljoj Teritoriji. Hoæeš li otiæi i pokupiti je za mene?
U redu. Kako se ono zove taj tip, Džejms? U Zoni ne verujem strancima.
Došao sam po Frimenovu aktovku.
Sada je moja, pseto jedno. Razguli odavde dok te nisam išamarao!
Vreme je da te neko nauèi lepom ponašanju.
Vreme je da ti dobiješ metak, da te ušutka.
Frimen loše æeš završiti. Poslao si me u osinjak. Oružje mi se pregrijalo od susreta s tvojim prijateljem. Moraæeš imati bolje objašnjenje!
Obeleženi, pa šta se desilo? Ne razumem.
Desio se taj tvoj Džejms! Oni i još 4 njegova pajdaša su me napali! Sada žvaèu olovo u paklu! Evo ti tvoja aktovka.
Stvarno mi je žao Obeleženi, nikada nisam ni pomislio da bi se nešto tako moglo desiti. Izvoli, nadam se da æe biti dovoljno za sve tvoje nevolje.
Pa Gavra, šta je sledeæe?

Pa sledeæe je sledeæi posao, Obeleženi. Jedan od Monolitovaca nam je trebao isporuèiti neke vrlo važne dokumente. Meðutim, komunikacija s njim je prekinuta, ne javlja se na svoj PDA. Zadnja poruka koju smo dobili je bila iz Radara. Mislimo da se sklonio u Laboratorij X-10 za vreme zadnje Emisije. Tvoj zadatak je da ga pronaðeš i doneseš dokumenta. Znam da si od nauènika dobio šljem koji štiti od PSI-zraèenja.
Sumnjam da Emisija ima iste efekte na Monolitovce. Dobro Gavra, potražiæu tog tipa.
Pronašao sam tog tvog Monolitovca. Samo što je mrtav, i ne samo on, laboratorij je pun mutanata. Evo ti dokumenti.
Odradio si to kao pravi profesionalac! Svaka èast. Izvoli zasluženu nagradu.
Friman, moramo razgovarati.
O èemu, Obeleženi?

Èim sam poèeo istragu o smrti mog prijatelja Fanga, odjednom su se Plaæenici poèeli pojavljivati. Prvo Gavra, zatim Bolt, pa su me onda neki strani Plaæenici hteli ubiti. Doneo sa Gavri dokumenta i napravio kopiju. Da li možeš išta razumeti iz njih?

Obeleženi, ja sam na zadatku. Znaèi tako, interesantno. Svi! Polako shvatam ko je i zašto ubio Fanga. Ali još nemam dovoljno informacija. Slušaj, Obeleženi, u dokumentima koje si doneo u mojoj aktovci, imaju i neki Džejmsovi dokumenti. Tako sam u njima našao nešto u superpoverljivom sastanku lidera PLaæenika. Koliko sam shvatio, sastanak æe se održati negde u Mraènoj Dolini. Na ovom sastanku biæe i osoba po imenu Blend. On bi trebao imati važnu fleš karticu. Ti bi trebao otiæi tamo i uzeti tu karticu. Zato požuri, Obeleženi. Uskoro æe i ostale voðe doæi i neæe biti mesta ni da pljuneš bezbedno.
Pronaæi æu tog Blenda i uzeti karticu. Stvarno se nadam da æe ovo konaèno rešiti ubistvo mog prijatelja!
Evo Blendove kartice.

Daj je ovamo. Pa da, kao što sam i mislio. Ovako Obeleženi, jedan od ove Plaæenièke kopiladi, koja se uglavnom sastoji od stranaca, je odluèio da zgrabi Monolit. Zašto, ne znam ali teško da je za nešto dobro. Fanga sz zaposlili da radi sam. Jednostavno zato što je bio jedini koji je bio u centru Zone. Takva osoba je bila neophodna Plaæenicima pa su ga zamolili da radi za njih, rekavši mu da nareðenja dolaze od razlièitih nauèno-istraživaèkih instituta. A i sam znaš da je Fang strènjak za elektroniku i da je veæ radio sa nauènicima u Jantaru. Zato je nakon nekog vremena Fang osetio da nešto nije u redu i poèeo da kopa. I oni su znali za to i izdali nareðenje da ga ubiju. Šta misliš ko je izdao nareðenje? Gavra! On je glavni koordinator ove organizacije u Zoni. Bez njega niko ništa ne rešava na svoju ruku. Usput, uzmi ovaj poklon od mene.
Hvala, Frimen. I sumnjao sam da je on ta kuèka, a sada sam i siguran u to. U redu. Idem da mu rascopam guzicu!
Sreæno, Obeleženi. Èuvaj se.
Kako ide život ovih dana, Frimen?
Kao i obièno, danas ovde, sutra tamo. Znaš i sam.
Život zna biti i malo èupav, zar ne? Nadam se da æeš ostati u blizini.
Pa, Gavra, nije valjda da me ne prepoznaješ? Znaš zašto sam došao?
Polako èoveèe. Ajde da popijemo nešto prvo. Imam dobrog konjaka. Naša baza u Mraènoj Dolini - je li to tvoje delo?
Može, naspi jednu, i tako nigde ne žurim. Da, baza je moje delo. Blend i ostala šestorica su uživali u mojem radu. Ali sada imam dokaze o tvojoj krivici. Zašto je Fang ubijen?

Radio je za nas misleæi da radi za nauènike. Dobro smo ga plaæali. U poèetku je radio obiène zadatke tipa donesi artefakt, izmeri nešto, itd. Iako je glavni cilj uvek bio - Monolit. Uvek smo tražili naèid da doðemo do Monolita, a ti, to jest Strelok i on, Fang - ste bili jedini koji ste znali kako doæi do njega. Ali, oèigledno, on je poèeo sumnjati u nas i poèeo kopati, a zatim pokušao nestati. Bojali smo se da æe nekome preneti tu informaciju o nama, pa sam osobno doneo odluku o njegovoj likvidaciji. Snajperista ga je èekao u selu krvopija. Ostatak znaš.
Kako je ovde vruæe. Pronašao sam ubicu, vreme je da odem Rudaru... Šta je ovo? Ah, ti...kuèko... Ti... Otrovao si me. Ti... Ti...ah..
Odmori malo, prijatelju.
Aaa... Moja glava. Moram otiæi do Rudara... Gde sam? Ah vidim, ti... Šta je to bilo?
Samo sedativ, ne brini, još mi trebaš živ. Jesi se odmorio? Ma goni Fanga, videæeš da je tako bolje.
Da gonim Fanga, kažeš? Znaèi da sve zaboravim? Da kažem "Fang, ti si bio dobar momak, prošli smo kroz sve i svašta, ali sada moram da brinem o sebi". To mi nudiš? Ali znaj - Strelok svoje ne izdaje.
Hoæemo malo da trgujemo? Delovi mutanata za municiju i artefakte.
Pa možemo. Ali prvo mi donesi 40 PDA, pa æemo razgovarati.
U redu, potražiæu ih. Delovi mutanata za municiju i artefakte mi dobro zvuèi.
Den, imam posao za tebe. Trebam nešto popraviti.
Ajde da vidimo šta imaš.
Popravi glavno oružje.
Popravi pomoæno oružje.
Popravi pancir.
Tvoje cene su da se zaprepastiš! Kao da popravljaš u kupatilu!
Izvoli, sve radi kako treba!
Drži, sve je popravljeno!
Stvarno znaš svoj posao. Savršeno je!
Da, odradio si dobar posao.
Možeš li popraviti nešto drugo?
Naravno da mogu.\n\nLista moguæih popravki:
Pa Den, jedva sam potrpao sve PDA-ove u svoj ranac. Ali evo ih, kako sam i obeæao.
Lep posao, Obeleženi. Sada možemo trgovati razlièitim delovima mutanata.
Den, èime æemo trgovati?

Niko u Zoni ne trguje delovima mutanata kao ja. Te ruke, stopala, repovi, oèi nikome ne trebaju, èak ih ni Sidoroviè ne traži, ni lokalni stalkeri! Najbliže mesto gde možeš dobiti nešto za njih je Deponija, kod stalkera pod imenom Gavran, a i kod njega samo za repove. Ako tražiš keš onda se obrati nauènicima u Jantaru, oni istražuju sve vrste mutanata iz cele Zone. Plaæaju pristojnu cenu i dosta s njima poslujemo. Ipak ti savetujem da posetiš Gavrana i da vidiš šta ti on može ponuditi... A sada evo šta ti ja nudim: Za 3 oka Mesine - daæu ti 3 paketa protupancirne 9x19 municije. Za 5 glava Skoèimiša - 3 paketa protupancirne 11.43x23 municije. Ako mi doneseš 2 ruke Kontrolera - daæu ti 5 paketa protupancirne 5.45 mm municije.
Zdravo, Den, evo doneo sam oèi!
Zdravo, Den, evo doneo sam glave Skoèimiša!
Bože, još mi u glavi zvoni od ovog stvorenja! Bilo bi lepo da me dobro poèastiš municijom, zar ne Den?!
Izvoli municiju. Ne moraš brojati - sve je tu.
Oh, doneo si. Veæ imam jednog odliènog kupca.

Nije to poklon, burazeru, razumeš. Municija je sada na ceni, posebno protupancirna! Osim mene, municijom samo trguju borci, zato uzmi onako kako je dogovoreno. Evo ti jedan mali dar - nekoliko flaša iz moje domovine - da sedeš, da se malo opustiš, malo mozak da ti se razbistri.
Dobro Den, idem po tu narudžbu stvorenja, ali mi je municija neophodna.
Den, šta ti je na umu?

Slušaj Obeleženi, upravo sam primio vrlo važnu informaciju. U Agropromu, u vojnoj bazi, nauènici su doneli nešto neobièno. Nije precizirano šta je, ali i sam kompleks je tajni projekat. Pošto znam da si energièan momak i da ne voliš vojsku, pomislio sam da bi želeo uèestvovati u ovoj operaciji.
Den, bolje ti je da se ne zezaš samnom. Ako me prevariš, glavu æu ti otkinuti.

Obeleženi, stvarno nisi fer! Informacija je pouzdana i grupa boraca te veæ èeka da im se pridružiš za napad. Kada doðeš u Agroprom, naæi æeš se sa Arharom i njegovim ljudima. ATo je solidna grupa veterana sa dosta iskustva u Zoni. Arhara je nekoæ bio èlan "Fridoma", ali je imao neka neslaganja sa Lukašem. Otišao je i poveo svoje ljude sa sobom i osnovao "nezavisne".
U redu Den, idem da se naðem sa Arharom. Sam æu prosuditi i njega i njegove ljude.
Jesi li ti Arhara?

Jesam, a ti si sigurno Obeleženi? Zdravo, èekali smo te. Da ti objasnim naš plan, idemo kroz južni ulaz i èistimo podruèje dok ti ideš u glavni kompleks i uzimaš taj paket ili šta veæ. Tamo je Ivašenko, glavni nauènik, u njega je pošiljka.
Plan je dobar i jednostavan, idemo. Lepo je naæi borce koji hoæe da podele rizik.
Den, bilo je tamo. Doneo sam ti ovaj šlem.
Vrlo interesantno. Dobar si ti deèko, Obeleženi. Izvoli nagradu. Prouèiæu ovaj šlem pa æemo se èuti posle. I da, Arhara me zamolio da ti kažem da doðeš do njega, u vezi nekog posla.
Zdravo Arhara, Den mi reèe da si me tražio?

Jedan od mojih ljudi je otišao u podzemlje Agroproma i nije se vratio. Iz iskustva znaš da je to mesto puno zlih duhova, bandita, mutanata pa èak i vojske. Imao je beležnicu i ne bih volio da pane u pogrešne ruke. Hoæeš li ga potražiti, i njega i beležnicu?
Zašto ne pošalješ nekog od svojih boraca?

Samo nas je nekoliko ostalo, pa ne mogu reskirati. Banditi i mutanti su u porastu, i svaki èovek sa naoružanjem mi je neophodan. A ti, kako sam i sam video, si majstor zanata. A i te katakombe poznaješ bolje nego iko drugi. Ljudi su donirali nešto municije za tebe.
Potražiæu i èoveka i beležnicu, a municija je uvek dobrodošla.
Kakva je sada situacija?
Moji borci su pod velikim pritiskom da zadrže ovaj kompleks. Bojim se da æemo se morati povuæi. Jesi našao beležnicu?
Jesam, izvoli. Tvoj èovek je mrtav, mislim da je uleteo u anomaliju Elektro dok je bežao od Kontrolera.
Hvala Obeleženi. Zaista smo sretni što te imamo za prijatelja. Kontroler kažeš? Onda stvarno moramo da promenimo lokaciju.
Arhara, jel' ima još nešto?

Obeleženi, ima jedan zadatak u Radaru. U Crvenoj Šumi, u blizini helikoptera, leži jedan ranac pored železne kutije. Sve što naðeš tamo možeš zadržati kao nagradu, mene zanima samo laptop! Treba da ga pronaðeš i doneseš mojem bratu Jakutu.
Arhara, pa PSI-zraèenje æe me ubiti pre nego se i približim tom mestu. A i gde da naðem Jakuta?
Seæaš se onog šlema što si odneo Denu? On æe ti pomoæi. S njim možeš proæi kroz PSI-zraèenje.

Jesam, gotovo je podešen, samo fale neke informacije. Jesi li pokupio informacije iz Laboratorija X-18? Postoje neki podaci u tom Laboratoriju o uticaju PSI valova na ljudski mozak. Slušaj Obeleženi, u vezi onog leša što si pronašao u Laboratoriju. Možeš li sa sigurnošæu reæi da je to telo Duha? Imam neke sumnje da je Duh izgubljen. Noæ prije negu su Vasilij i Duh otišli u Laboratorij, popili smo nešto votke zajedno. Prièali smo o Zoni, o Monolitu, ali Duh je uglavnom bio tih. Ali je imao nekekav èudan pogled, kao predator. Slušaj Obeleženi, imam koordinate jednog skrovišta u Agropromu. Poslaæu ti ih na PDA. Duh mi je dao te koordinate u sluèaju da se ne vrati. Idi tamo i proveri da li možeš tamo imaju neke informacije gde bi se mogao kriti.

Obeleženi, stvarno je pravo zadovoljstvo s tobom poslovati! U suštini si u pravu. Tražio je da mu pronaðem osobu koja lièi na njega. Pokušali smo, Obeleženi, ali da budem iskren rezultati nisu obeæavajuæi. Možeš li nam pomoæi? Naša sistemska zaštita od Emisije je otišla. Nešto smo popravili, ali opet nije to to. Oh, Obeleženi, opet si nas zadužio. Rekli su nam da æe helikopter biti spreman za 3 dana i da æe tek tada moæi da poleti. Što se tièe dnevnika, dešifrovao sam ovo:"Jakut u Skladištima". Ko bi to mogao biti? I da, uzmi ovo kao zahvalu za pomoæ. Nije puno, snajperska municija.

Stvarno nisam imao nikakve veze sa tom zasedom! Ali vidim da ti stvarno ne veruješ u Duhovu smrt. U redu, znam za još jedno mesto u Radaru. Znaš li gde je ulaz u Laboratorij X-10? Tamo bi trebao biti, a ako nije tamo, onda stvarno ne mogu da ti pomognem.

Živa ti majka bila. Kada si otišao, nisam mogao verovati da si nestao. Toliko smo toga prošli zajedno a ti si uvek bio najbolji od nas. Ali imao sam oseæaj i bio sam u pravu. Jako mi je drago što te vidim.

Znaš da sam dobar pripovedaè, hehe. Ukratko, nas trojica smo krenuli u Laboratorij: ja, Vasilij i, pa nazovimo ga "glavni kljuè". Ni sam nisam znao hoæemo li biti spaljeni ili ne. Preko nekih ljudi sam saznao da si živ. Verovatno znaš za grupu "Osvetnici"? Ali nisu to nikakvi Osvetinci, to su obièni Plaæenici. Ubijaju sve po narudžbi. Ipak postoji neka misterija. Prièa se da tu grupu vode ljudi iz klana Poslednji Dan. Znaš li da sam u svojoj mladosti ošamario njihovog bivšeg voðu? Prema nepotvrðenim informacijama - klan se ponovo okupio, i sada znam zašto hoæe da me unište. Svi ih izbegavaju i nijedna frakcija ne želi imati posla s njima. Èak ih i Monolitovci zaobilaze. I još nešto, osim što treba biti mrtav, treba mi i njegov fleš drajv, jer su na njemu imena svih potencijalnih žrtava i siguran sam da smo i mi na njemu. Približnu lokaciju naših ljudi prebaciæu ti na PDA.
Duše, tvoj rat je moj rat, tvoj neprijatelj je moj neprijatelj. Spreman sam nekome glavu skinuti! Veæ sam se susretao sa èlanovima Poslednjeg Dana, tako da znam da to nije bajka.

Idem, nadam se da ovaj put neæe pobeæi.
Pa Duše, nema više Zveri. Evo lista klijenata.

Zdravo Jakut, malo sam u nevolji, poreèkao sam se sa Gavrom. Otrovao me. Glava mi je olovna. Pili smo neki konjak. Verovatno nisu ni primetili da sam samo pijan. Kada sam došao sebi vidio sam da su mi džepovi prazni, novac i sve ostalo je nestalo. Gde su? U samoj bazi Fridoma!

Hello brother. Who are you?
I am Dan of the "Hunter" faction. We have organised small base here, we buy up stalkers artefacts and monster parts.
Do you trade your goods with the bar?.
We sell our mutant parts to Sakharov in Yantar, the bar doesn't pay a good price. You should talk with Zahar, he has set up our main base close to the bar.
Zahar, do you buy artefacts?.

We buy up Artefacts for the scientists. At present we buy Artefacts "Crystal" and "Meat Chunk". For 3 Crystals we will give an Absolute Artefact, for 3 Meat Chunks we will give a modified weapon. You bring 1 "Gravi" and you will receive 3 Antirad.
Zahar, I have 3 Crystals for you.
I have found three Meat Chunks, saved especially for you.
I need some Antirad, here's a Gravi.
Sakharov will be happy to see 3 Crystals.
You always surprise me, how do you manage to find so many Artefacts? My blockheads only find Stone Blood or nothing. Nothing this time?
Gravi? here take some Antirad.
This time my backpack is empty.
Zahar, what's wrong?

Until recently, we once a week sent Artefacts to the scientists in Yantar. A group of Mercenaries has been ambushing my men trying to make these deliveries in the Wild Territory. Can you get rid of these Mercs?
Zahar, these are your problems, why should I get involved?

Marked One, you know my men are not good fighters. I'm afraid if we try to do it ourselves, my men will be wiped out. I went to Voronin and asked for help, but as always he answered: I can't spare the manpower. Help us re-establish a route to the Scientists.
I will help you Zahar, I don't want to see you go out of business.
Zahar greetings, the pass is free of Mercs now.
You're a fine fellow, at last we can trade with the Scientists directly.

Yes that's good advice, here's your reward.
Well Prapor how's the service life?.
Marked One, we caught a bandit trying to sneak through yesterday. We found a broken PDA in his backpack..
What's that got to do with me?.
Well you're the kind of person who likes to stick his nose into other peoples affairs. It's yours if you bring me scientific first-aid kits.
How many?.
Give me 20, it's a bit to much to ask? Well, I will settle for 10.
Well you ask a big price for a PDA that doesn't work, 10 scientific first-aid sets? Well alright I will bring.
Well Prapor I have brought the first-aid sets.

Thanks Marked One, these are for my men. Voronin, the Škrti, doesn't supply us with these. I need to take care of my guys, you understand?. Here take the PDA, go to the Barman. He has two egg-heads in the back who can repair anything.
Greetings Barman, who can repair this PDA?

Barman, do you think I'm stupid? For repairing PDA, "Chimera Tears"? No! the best I can do is "Fire Tears".
Marked One, do not shout, all right give me "Fire Tears" and we have a deal.
Alright, repair it while I'm gone. I will find your "Fire Tears".
I have found the "Fire Tears", here.

Is this a joke? There might be people in trouble or somebody needs rescued!. And your drunks destroy the information?
Marked One, I understand the guys did something stupid. I myself knocked them into the middle of next week. Here take a box of Vodka as indemnification.
Barman, do you think everybody is as selfish as you? Give the box of Vodka to the repairmen, maybe they will burn your bar down this time! This has been a big waste of time.
Professor I should talk to you.
Yes Marked One, I'm listening.
Professor some days ago I encountered the corpse of a military man. On that corpse I found a note, it mentioned an expedition to the Brain Scorcher.

Marked One, I shouldn't even be telling you this. Approximately several months ago a group of scientists, with support from above, obtained a permit to search Lab X-10, which is located in the Radar. I, in every possible way, tried to stop them. Explaining that the territory was unstudied and chances of reaching the lab alive were unknown. I suggested that we first complete the study of lab X-16. To understand better how quickly PSI influences affect the brain and to design counter measures. But unfortunately they wouldn't listen to me. Weeks have past and nothing has been heard from them. I am inclined to think the worst.

Its possible you didn't investigate all the bunker, for certain during that moment you had more important affairs. Don't you think that its necessary for you to visit there once again?

Doctor, I have some urgent business.

Mad idea, but he could persuade me and some others of the Board. Sakharov tried to dissuade us, but... Money... Spits and pants... A heap of money spent in this project and pride... Rattles, eyes are closed.
Yes you all in blood, give I though I will try to stop blood.
Already... Pants... Not help... Shoot down... Shoot down me.
I should ask.
I Beg... Stop... Stop these... khe-khe I can not... Kill me.
Greetings, Zahar, is a pity Dan.
It here has left one bag, PDA Tirana, speak it to you is necessary?
Yes the informant asked to extract for it.
Well so drive 30000 and it yours
Costly? certainly, well all right hold.
Lines I without money will approach today later.
Greetings, Zahar, yes here took the order From Dan and he has died.
You about the helmet? Yes give I calculate. Yes, Arhara asked to come to it.
Greetings.. has found for Dan a flash card, and... In general of that to do I do not know.
Yes give I will try, wait... So... Yeah... Here hold, Marked One, the adjusted helmet.
Greetings the brother.
That the sad such?.

Yes do not ask nasty and all. There, in the bunker, the person whom I have killed lies. He/she is the scientist, he to me has told that they tried to disconnect the burner, but is visible not destiny. The last I have settled.

And you trust them? You know for what they here Rushed? You know that searched here for LeHavre? To tell? Here there is a secret pass to the Monolith. They after all understood that it not to pass through Pripyat. There Monolithians like ants in an ant hill, and here time, and you already at a Monolith. Has understood that here it is necessary to all of them?
Knew and was silent? As that it not absolutely friendly
Yes I did not know precisely, hearings went, well few times heard about this pass from people, and here now you to me have told also I about all have guessed.
And where to be this secret passage?

Yes that's just the point that I do not know. You know... Here that... Knowingly your LeHavre here sniffed up. Descend It, talk to Freeman. It seems to me, he should know. Most likely there should be a certain plan burner, I assume that it now at somebody from Mercenaries. Yes at me business one more to you is. As with the plan you will understand, come, we will talk.
Frets I will talk to Freeman, perhaps the plan will be.
Hello, Freeman. Well how are you? About LeHavre heard?
Yes who did not hear, all Zone knows about it.

Business is, but is strict between us. And so speak there is a secret pass to a Monolith, through burner on the Radar but to find this pass, the plan burner is necessary. You do not know, at whom this plan could be?

Listen, Marked One, in the first meeting with DeJames I saw at it a certain plan. I then did not understand much and did not know, but you know, memory at me good, especially visual. And so when you to me have brought my case, in it lay not only my documents, but also documents of DeJames. In them that is mentioned casually about what plan, also one mercenary on a nickname of Tamaz there is mentioned. As I have understood, it was someone like the foreman at LeHavre, and just through it and its brigade LeHavre liquidated objectionable to it people. One of these days I was reached by the information that the rests of a gang of LeHavre gather on a dump. Most likely Tamaz will be there. If there is a plan burner it should be at Tamaz. Descend there, check up.
All right I descend, if something I will find, I will bring to you.
Well, Freeman, I have found the plan. Look, and I something not absolutely understand that.
Give I will look. Aha here... And thought. Here look, Marked One, you see here a room where the switch to be? Well and so you will come downstairs, well and there you will find in general.
Thank you, Freeman, has again gained, from me kickback. Well all I have run, have put much.
Well, Ghost, you as always are right. I have found a secret passage.

I and thought. Yes, Marked One, business to you is. It is necessary for me, that you have found rare enough Artefact. It is called "Gold Chunk". To find it is possible only near Chernobyl, most likely it is necessary to look in North Chernobyl (in a courtyard). Find me 10 pieces, and I will tell about one secret passage. North Chernobyl in the Sarcophagus and back. You will make?
"Gold Chunk" you tell, all right I will look.
Faugh, Ghost, has hardly found also truth a rare Artefact. Hold.

Both! So quickly? The good fellow. Here look: I will note to you an entrance with North Chernobyl in the Sarcophagus in your PDA, and here pass from the Sarcophagus on North Chernobyl to be in a room with the Monolith. It is necessary to look a little. Well, good luck, my friend.
Well, Ghost, affairs are made, it is possible and on rest?.

You Will have time to have a rest still, Marked One. Business at me to you is. Heard history about one Monolithian? Is not present? And so, there was one Monolithian, from scientists like which instead of praying to the Monolith hours kept diaries. Yes not simple, in them a lot of the valuable information on Chernobyl and that the main thing, on the Monolith! As if at it even the hypothesis was that this stone not a terrestrial origin. Well after you in the Sarcophagus to rustle have guided that, moreover and burner have disconnected, in Chernobyl the landing of fighters has landed at support from air. Well those have left a Monolith who on cleverer, Bloodsuckers what have collected to eat yes with secret tracks. Our hero too has set. But here something at it on road has occurred that it has not carried away the diaries with itself, and has hidden. My people have found it, yes have shaken properly, in general it has broken up, I will tell on truth, I wanted to catch for a long time these diaries, to me about them my person from a Monolith told. And so it has hidden them in three different places in Chernobyl, in a courtyard. You understand about what I will ask? Yes it should is necessary to descend and bring their these diaries to be 3 pieces. You will make?
Eat, Ghost, and I have gathered for rest! Well it is fine, I descend. Well.
Well, Ghost, was I there. Here hold 3 diaries as promised.
Give I will look. Aha, interesting reading matter. Well, Marked One, business necessary has made, now and can have a rest. Good luck, you the brother!
Hello, who are you guys?
Hello Marked One, We are from the group "Clear sky", this territory is considered ours.
I understand.

Though the territory is considered ours, a lot of key points are held by strong groups of bandits. I sent one of my men to observe their camp nearby, but he has not returned. I fear he has been captured or maybe even killed. The men believe that our man is still alive and want to make a rescue attempt. As you can see we are few in number and I have a twisted ankle and can't lead the attack. You are an obviously skilled stalker. If you will lead this attack, I will be in your debt.
I will gladly help you, can you spare any ammo or med-kits?
Our first-aid sets are few but take this ammo.
I can use all the ammo I can get.
Here take this, good luck to you guys.
Are you OK?.
Yes, I'm a little beat up but nothings broken...
How did you get captured?.

I was watching the bandit camp and nothing was really happening so I decided to wash my socks. I put my weapon down and started cleaning when I heard a bloodsucker roar. It was after me so I ran, and in my panic I ran into this base and became a captive. The bandits were howling with laughter at me, it was quite humiliating.
Yes, well we need to get out of here before any more bandits arrive.
I got your man out, he's safe now.
Here thanks, listen...if you go to our main base, please don't mention this.
And where's your base?

Its not to far from here, you go on a straight line past the church, then past a tower, and then you will see our outpost in a small farm, behind that is a portal, it takes you to our base. Wait, I will put it your PDA an approximate location of the farm.
I understand, thanks. What about a reward?
I've nearly forgotten, here you are.
What's going on....?
One more thief caught, it was a good idea to set that trap. You think you can just walk in anywhere you like and take what you want?
Listen brother, in the Zone practically all houses are owner-less. If I knew this place had occupants I would not have touched anything.
This bog has become infested with thieves, you can't turn your back for a minute! ...
Brother listen, I'm no thief. What do I have to do to prove it to you?
Your going to have to do a job for us! or become frog food...
What job are you talking about?
Nearby is an Artefact container, we need you to retrieve it..
So what's the catch? Mutants, Zombies, or Chimera?.
Its nothing like that, an anomaly has formed a portal around the container. We need you to find a way to get it.
How will I find a way?
Its not my problem.
Can you spare any cartridges or first-aid sets.
I wont go, sorry.
OK then.
That was a little tricky but here it is, the 'container'.
I didn't expect you to return. I thought you would run away.
I told you I was no thief, do you believe me now?
Yes, I believe you. Here, this has all been a misunderstanding.
Why do you live in the middle of the marsh?

Why?, I grew up not far from here. When all this madness, called the Zone, began I was conscripted into a local protection group. I had not long been married and was expecting my first-born. I was stationed on the perimeter, the Zone wasn't as large then. And here it comes... The letter, my wife has radiation sickness. My village was lied to by the government who told them it was safe to stay there. I have to go and see my wife, but the young officer denies my request. I lost my mind and grabbed my weapon and shot down all who tried to stop me. I walked into the hospital with my clothes covered in blood, the AK-47 in my hands. There my Grandma sat, and I ask "Where is my Katka", and she points to the sign: 'Mortuary', I... I go in there. There she lies... So BEAUTIFUL.
kalmyak please calm down.

It was so quiet, and then, beside Katka, I found the baby so small, pink cheeks, and eyes same as me. I held his lifeless body to my chest and slumped into a corner and wept., sat there for I don't know how long. The military Police came to arrest me, I didn't resist. I was taken back to the camp and locked in a cell.
Then what happened?

Next day a big group of Mutants attacked our section of the perimeter and broke through the defence. Gunfire everywhere, screams and roars, panic everywhere. The guards had fled, leaving me to my fate. My comrade Fedor came to my rescue and shot the lock open. He handed me a weapon and told me to run. Since then the Zone has been my home, I have nothing to go back to. Here I make ointments out of Mutant Glands and local plant life, there healing properties are amazing. If you ever need some I trade for vodka or cigarettes.
Life has not been fair to you kalmyak. The truth is, that's what brought me to your camp; to buy some ointment
I will not tell you the recipe. Simply remember, it reduces radiation and stops bleeding.
Greetings kalmyak, I've come for some ointment.
You have vodka or cigarettes? Remember, one jar of ointment, for 3 bottles of Vodka, or 3 packs of cigarettes.
Here are the cigarettes.
Here's some vodka.
Well, maybe next time.
Vasily, can you take a look at this.
It needs a little work.
Repair the first weapon.
Repair the second weapon.
Repair the armor.
I don't have that kind of money.
Well here look as the newcomer.
How do you even wear this suit in this condition? I will need to change all the armor plates.
Its quite good, I thank you.
Now its even better, than when it was new.
Can you take a look at something else?
Yes please that there at us:
Are you the twin brother of Sidorovich?

What!!, Ive been in this Zone from the very beginning. And you can tell Sidorovich that one day I will feed him to the local marsh giant. Do you know who the first was to supply arms in the Zone? Me thats who!!! I was the first trader who could organise deliveries of everything, both products, and weapons, and medicines. Yes the Barman was my assistant. All business with the fighters was in these hands. But that Son of a dog managed to bribe major Serebrjannikova, and all who were connected with me departed. It wasnt long before this "rat" had me pushed out of my bunker, yes-yes the same bunker where now this hamster lives. Together with people like Borov he had me thrown out onto the street. Im still alive though, much to the disapointment of Sidorovich. But here there are kind people. I have survived, though I have a bad limp. But I will return someday and spit on his vile corpse!.
Vasily thats some story, I didn't mean any disrespect. Now that we have got that out of the way, do you do repairs?
Yes this is my shop, but I cant get anything done in my condition.
And whats wrong?
My Foot aches, especially at night. The wound doesnt heal... So bad that it keeps me from doing my job.
Well, can I help?
Yes there is a local man, kalmyak, who makes these fine ointments. Ive had some before, but now Im in such bad shape that I cant make the trip myself.
I will go and get the ointments for you.
Well, if you will get me 3 jars of ointment then I could start back to work.
Greetings, Vasily, get ready to dance.
Again you joke. I cant even stand up.
Vasily, I don't joke, I have found what was promised. Here take 3 ointments as agreed.
Well, for me, you will be my best client, I always without turn will serve you.
Hello Clerk, why do you look so gloomy?

Five years ago I found out I had an ulcer, well I never got treated. I just took something for the pain and I could bear it. In the last couple of months its gotten unbearable. The kalmyak gave me some ointment but it doesnt work on ulcers.
What can I do to help?
Bring to me a "soul" artefact, its a known cure for ulcers. I will reward you with the kalmyaks ointment.
I will try to help.
Clerk, have you forgotten about our arrangment?
You mean about the ointment? I Remember-remember. You have the artefact?
Here it is.
Well thanks, heres 3 jars of ointment.
Hello, are you the leader of this faction?

Well, for the last six months, yes I am. We are the faction "Clear sky". Our purpose is to study the Zone, but not like other scientists. More truly, we have different interests and a different vision of its future.
And in what way are you different? In my opinion, all the problems that the Zone poses to mankind are because of scientists.

Yes, the majority, but not all. There are fanatics like the Monolith type. There are others, whos intentions are not clear... We are not fanatics, we don't pray to anybody, but also we have not come here to get rich. We really study the Zone, we don't answer to any goverment, thats the main difference. Its both our advantage, and also a disadvantage.
And so you have little faith in the people in power.

Yes actually, but we are ready to co-operate with them. Thats if they have the right intentions. But, I think, their scientific research is still focused on producing cheap electric power and even worse the production of new weapons of mass destruction. We, most of all, are afraid of that. In a Zone full of vicious mutants and deadly anomalies, Man is still the most dangerous.
So you absolutely don't communicate with other scientists in any way?

Well why should we? We support informal contacts to some scientists, in particular with professor Kruglov. We are not rich, and sometimes we don't have the necessary equipment. Here we do mostly field work. At a stage when a laboratory is required, we contact the scientists. By the way, do you want to work for science?
What kind of work?
Lately, we have observed a certain mutation among a species of mutant. We don't know how its all connected. We don't have any specimans for research.
What kind of mutant are you talking about?
In the northwest of the marsh we have found a different type of controller. Its necessary to get a part of this monster. We need to examine its brain, I think you understand what needs to be done.
Well, Im not against the work of science, give me the data and I will go search.
I brought the brain of the controller, you want to see it?
Lets take a look... Yes, an unusual copy. Very large.
Thats the job done, what kind of reward do I get for dragging this big melon all the way across the marsh.
Yes certainly, certainly. Here, take this. I wanted to tell you, if you find any unusual mutant parts, with great pleasure I will buy them from you.
Look, I brought something interesting for you.
Let's look at what you have brought.
Here is "Red bloodsucker tentacles".
I have "a Red hand of the burer".
Sorry, Sviblov, I don't have anything today.
Uh you, an unusual copy. Here, take in exchange.
The First time I've see such an interesting copy. Yes, this is for you.
Sviblov, whats on your mind?
I want to start sending the men on regular patrols, but we lack the firepower to deal with large mutants.
Do you have any ideas?

I do know where there is a PKM heavy machine gun. When my men patrolled near the abandoned farm the bandits, who have recently occupied the place, opened fire on them with the weapon. We are not as strong as we were before our unsuccessful attempt to break through to the Zone centre. We lost our founder, Lebedev, and the majority of our veterans in that operation. Bandits have taken advantage of our weakness and control key points in the marsh. We somehow manage to hold this base and the approaches, also the "hunters" have helped us. If you can steal this machine gun it well help solve our problems. But I need you to do it with stealth.
So you suggest I remain unseen?
I have no love for bloodshed, we only use our weapons as a last resort. So try to get it without being noticed. One of my men already waits for you, talk with him. he will tell you all the details.
Greetings, how are you doing?

Greetings, you were sent by Sviblova? Their strength and positions are as follows, seven: four in the street and three more in the building. As you will make your the way onto the farm - search for a backpack, they store the weapon in it.
Your not going with me?
Together, we would make too much noise.
Well, then wait for me here.
I bought the weapon.
What happened?
Things didn't go quite as planned. During the most interesting moment "hunters" arrived and a gunfight ensued. But I managed to get the machine gun.
Im glad you were successful and came back unharmed. Here take this as a gift.
Can I help you?
Yes, I wanted to ask if you have seen any Monolithians? I mean here, on the bogs.
As far as I know, they are not present.
We have evidence that they are here, but don't know how they are infiltrating. They don't usually poke their nose south of the Radar. This really troubles me, these fanatics are devils.
What do you think they are up to??
With these brainless fanatics anythings possible. They didn't come here for artefacts. Listen, theres a man I would like you to meet.
Who?, tell me about him first.

His name is Cat, a smart guy who likes to keep a low profile, former KGB. He said he found something, I didn't press him for details. You should go and see what hes found. I will put his location on your PDA..
Hello, are you Cat?
Yes Im Cat, has Dan sent you? I asked him to find someone with a bit of common sense, and he sends a rookie.
Watch your mouth! If you want to keep your teeth!.
Woah...camn down.... sorry, Ive been waiting here for Dan to send some help. I hope your ready to deal with a dose of high radiation.
What are you talking about?

Dan spoke to you about the Monolithians? I was the first to have noticed something was wrong. The Monolith have become more active. At first they were sighted on the Agroprom, then I personally saw them in the Dark Valley. Ive also tracked them directly to the Radar, I had to abort that recon operation as I got a bad case of radiation sickness. I was not ready for such a campaign. Since then my health has failed. Now I have seen them here, one of them has died in a highly radioactive Zone. We need to search the corpse for some information. Believe me, if these fanatics have conceived something, things could end badly for all of us.
Why should I believe anything you say, you agents leave a trail of innocent bodies wherever you go. I think I should rise and leave or first put a bullet in your forehead.

You are right, I served in the KGB. Enough bad things have happened to me. I had to disappear and where else better than the Zone. The only thing waiting for me out in the world is a bullet in the temple, or cyanide in my coffee, it all depends on the imagination of my "friends". The Zone is my home now, so thats why I want to find out what the Monolith is up to.
Well, lets assume I believe you. What's next?

Well first of all we need to examine that body. I was observing the 3 Monolithians marking a map. They went in different directions, I followed one. He went through a radioactive Zone and was quickly overcome and collapsed. Like I already explained before I would go myself but for me its certain death. My system just cant handle the trauma yet and I would be dead in minutes.
Alright, show me the place.
Lets go, only take your time, its difficult for me to walk quickly. I will take you to the place, there will be a ruined house, in the ruins look for a corpse.
Here Cat, I found a map.
Let me see that. So its a map of the bogs. Strange, I don't understand what they were doing. What are these marks for?
Well so?

They have marked here one place, one more place in the southwest, here are figures, here are measurements - height, width and length. And here the rest... Alright, I now go to the bar at camp "Clear Sky" to think about what we should do. Lets go, we will sttle our affairs there.
Well, Cat, have you received medical treatment?
Yes, but here only vodka rescues. You know that radiation influences the brain, earlier I would have quickly worked out those plans you found. Now my brain is constantly clouded with fog.
So, what will we do?
Well, actually, what we need to do is find the other two Monolithians, probably we can learn more from them.
How will we find them?

Here on base "Clear sky" they have the equipment that might help us find the remaining Monolithians. Go to the communications room and ask the officer if he can locate them, probably, they will be on their own network signal. When you find them, bring me any information you find and we will analyze it together.
Welcome, what is it you want?
I need to find two people, can you help?.
I understand, you want to trace them. Who do you want to find?
Two Monolithians. I have a PDA from a Monolithian, you can link the signal to the others?
Well well, I can help you, give me the PDA, but in exchange you should render me a service.
What do you want?
I am fond of electronics. I managed to get a TV set, but the picture tube has went kaput. Could you get me another TV?
Where am I gonna find a TV? If I get you this TV, are you sure you can locate the people Im looking for?
Ive done it before, so I think the second time will be easier.
Alright, I will go and find you a TV.
Well, did you bring it?
Yes, here take it. Not new, of course, but the Zone shops are closed.

Thank you, now lets take a look for those signals. I have picked up some suspicious signals. I have narrowed it down to five places, where there are signals. I cant be more precise than that, on the bogs strong radiation interferes. I will put in your PDA the co-ordinates of these places. Sorry, it looks like its necessary for you to run about.
I knew it wasnt going to be easy, thanks anyway.
Hello Cat, I found a notebook on one of the Monolithians.
This is interesting, very interesting. They are planning to construct something, but I cant tell what it is yet.
Whats next?
I need to study these notes somemore. Im sure you have other affairs to attend to, do you know the bar "100 X-ray"? I will meet you there later and we will discuss this further.
Greetings.
Greetings wanderer, have a rest. We are always glad to see good people.
I am tired, its a long journey to reach your camp. Whats that smell? Something burning?
Dammit!, Ive burnt it again!... What will I feed the men?
Thats quite a stench... What were you cooking?

The brothers brought in a wild boar, but the meat is tough and stinks when you fry it. The best meat comes from the pseudo-giant. Tastes sort of like chicken, but 100 times better. Listen, are you looking for work?
Depends on what you want me to do.
Its not a dirty job, youll just need to run around a bit.
Run around? I hope your not going to ask me to go after one of those giant swamp monsters.

I don't want you to kill anything. A few days ago some of the men saw a "red pseudo-giant" on the Agropom. These are very rare, and their meat... Mind you.. even at the best restaurant you couldnt get something as delicious.
What is it you want? You want me to slay this beast?

I don't want you to kill him. I want you to mark him with this special sniper rifle that shoots a micro-transmitter needle. Then we will send out a hunting party, it will take several men to carry that much meat. So, just mark the "red pseudo-giant" and don't kill it. Then return here with the rifle.
I Hope you will pay well?
don't worry about that. Just take care not to kill him, the thought of that precious meat rotting away brings tears to my eyes.
Greetings, Barman.
Greetings, my friend! I can see the location of the "red pseudo-giant" displayed on my PDA. I have already informed Dan, so we are looking forward to a good breakfast and supper for several days.
Sounds much more appetizing than stale bread and old sausage. How about the payment?
Certainly-certainly. Here you are.
Hello brother, who are you?
Borman is my name. How did you reach here by yourself? Even groups of five men don't stand much of a chance of reaching this far north.
I have discovered paths that are not known by many stalkers.
Regardless of that, if you reached Limansk you must be very skilled. Your help is needed here brother.
Whats going on??

Here's the situation, we hold this side of the bridge and the Monolithians hold the other side. As you can see, the situation is far from stable, these damn mutants and zombies just keep appearing. Our main problem is this Monolith sniper, the Voroshilovsky marksman. This bastard picks off one or two of my men each day. Do you think you can take him out?
What kind of reward will you give?
Well Brother, Ive got 10 packs of assorted cartridges I can give you, only.
Alright, I will try.
Greetings, Borman.
You don't cease to surprised me, how did your adventure go?
Lets just say your problem has been put to rest.
Thank you brother, you saved many lives by ridding us of that bastard... Well here take these as I promised.
Is there anything else?
Yes again your help is needed. Here these devils (Monolithians) jam our radio signal, so we cant communicate with anybody.
Well Im not a radio engineer, what good could I do?

You have not understood, you need to find the "muffler". And here is the most interesting part. We will take the Monolithians small "muffler" to the Škrtici, where he will make adjustments so that the "muffler" blocks the radio signal of the Monolithians. Take the "muffler" To Škrtici and then put it back where you found it. Then it will be their turn to suffer.
Not a bad plan, but where do I search for the "muffler"?
Its somewhere around the building on the hill. I cant be more precise than that. We are not rich here, but you will be rwarded.
You have persuaded me, Borman.
Greetings, shopkeeper.
My old friend, why have you come? To buy something?
I come on business for Borman, you already know the situation?
Yes, you mean about the "muffler"?
Here it is, a heavy lump of steel.
This will take me about five hours to adjust, come back then.
Well, is the "muffler" ready?
Its too early, I said five hours.
Miser, is the "muffler" ready?
Its ready, now let the Monolithians suffer. Take it back to where you found it, and send my greetings to Borman.
Its done brother, the "muffler" is in place.
You have gained many friends.
Glad to help you and greetings to you from the Škrti.
Here, take this as promised.
Greetings Cat, you look terrible.
Im in really bad shape. It feels like I will die soon, thats no joke.
Can I help?
I need something to extract this radiation poison from my bones. I've heard the kalmyak can make such a medicine...
Are you talking about the ointment?
There is another remedy the kalmyak can make. I also know he was fiends with the Hologram, he might know something also.
They have antirad here, it reduces radiation.
My condition is too far advanced for antirad, I need something much stronger.
Alright Cat, I will go ask for the medicine.
What should I ask for?
The kalmyak has a recipe, he can prepare a special medicine.
Alright I will go.
Greetings, kalmyak.
Hello, have you come for ointment?
Ive come for medicine, but I need something special. Do you know "Cat"? Well, the guy has a bad dose of radiation sickness that just keeps getting worse every day.
"Cat"!! A better name for him is rat! I know his past, how much innocent blood has he drunk?. He can die for all I care!
Brother do it for me, I really need his help finding out what the Monolithians are doing in the marsh.
Well, only for your sake then. But this medicine requires ingrediants that I don't have.
What do you need?

The artefact "Night star" and ten "feet of snorks". All the other ingrediants I have. But there is one condition, to prepare the "medicine", it has to be done in the early hours before dawn. Do not ask why, I will not tell. So, to bring the components and then you have until 5.00 am to pick up the medicine. If you don't come at this time, then we need to wait for the next day. Got it?
I will go search.
Greetings kalmyak, here is the components you asked for.
Give them here. I need time to prepare the "medicine", so go take care fo other matters. Come back in 12 hours, but don't hang around here or you get nothing.
Well is the "medicine" ready?
You have come early, its not ready yet.
Hello kalmyak, have you finished preparation of the "medicine"?
Here, its ready, Its radioactive so I hope you have artefacts or antirad to couter the effects during transportation.
Cat, here take this as soon as possible.

For an old backpack? For pair cobble-stones and a stick of rotten sausage?
Well I do not know, are long it is necessary to give. The backpack is necessary to you? It is necessary on eyes I see. Ten and copecks it is less.
Sidorovich!
That, has brought money?
Is not present, it is simple in your eyes mind has come to look, perhaps you will change the mind.
On, an Egyptian Vulture, choke.
In, here it is another story, take away.
Greeting Strelok.
Hello brother, does this look familiar?
Lets take a look, Yes!, it is our backpack. You are a savior indeed!.
Excuse my haste, but I need those documents.

Yes-yes, of course, only they are not with us. We put them in another spot for insurance. Its not far from here go north from our cave and past the clearing and you will find an abandoned army tank in the woods. Near to it look for a backpack, the documents are in it.
Greetings, olden time.
Hello, Streloks, well docks at you?

At me. As I will remember your words "Yes nonsense, trifling matter"... Here always I was confused with expressions of type "trifling matter", "small Halturka"... Blows from such affairs by usually big bum.
It happens, the Zone is unpredictable, all can be. Give them here.
Well interested in documents?

You know a long time ago I worked for the Mercenaries. There there was one person I worked with gathering intel in the Zone. But we didn't share all the information we gathered with the Mercenaries. We established hiding places and strored the intel on flash cards, a part of them directly on documents. After my quarrel with the Mercenaries, me it was necessary to stash everything. Till a time I thought it would be safe to retreive them. I sent my old comdade to check up to one of these hiding places. But two days and he has not returned, and also his PDA is silent. Also I sent the Pilgrim long ago to check up a path to the Lost Village, and also no word from him.
What now?
We need to find my old comrade. If I am right, the documents contain important information. Meanwhile I will try to communicate with the Pilgrim.
I have had no news from the Panther about where to search for the girl who has abducted from O-consciousness, this situation also is not clear... Where though do I search for your comrade?
In the red wood. Its not far from the house of the forester, close to the wall. Its in an old abandoned mine, there I made a small hiding place.
I will look for him. Whats his name?
Denis, if he lives help him.
Hello, are you Denis?
Thank you friend, did Fang send you?
Yes, he sent me to save your ass.
Its not the first time hes bailed me out of trouble.
Do you have the documents?
The hiding place was empty! I only had time to check it then the controller got me. Hey, can you help me get to the local stalker base? Its not far but Im too weak right now to make it by myself.
No problem, you just follow me. I will try to keep a slow pace so you can keep up.
Hello, I didn't expect to get any help. How did you know there was trouble?
One of my men spotted a group of Mercenaries, and we decided to track them.
Well, Im glad that you did.
Its nothing compared to all the help you have given us brother.
Bad news Fang, the hiding place is empty.
Shit! I cant believe it. Are you sure?
Yes, there was nothing there. Denis said so..... Or do you think?

No.... Denis is a trusted friend. So who has visited us that could have known? Alright, have a rest but not too long. The Astrologer has sent an SMS for you to meet him in the Cordon at the rookie village. I communicated with the Doctor and told him to let the Astrologer know Im alive. Im not sure what this guy is up to but we need to be careful with him, he's a smooth operator. I want you to deliver this copy of my map to him.
